name: zendframework/zend-validator
description: provides a set of commonly needed validators

suggest.zendframework/zend-barcode: Zend\Barcode component for Barcode specific validators
suggest.zendframework/zend-db: Zend\Db component for Db specific validators
suggest.zendframework/zend-i18n: Zend\I18n component to allow translation of validation error messages
suggest.zendframework/zend-servicemanager: Zend\ServiceManager component to allow using the ValidatorPluginManager
